name: Invia Soldi, Importo Superiore
children: As a Provayap.Valid.User1
Given Login Page_Yap is open
Given I click on Annulla_Impronta_Digitale if present
When I click on element Input_1
When I click on element Input_4
When I click on element Input_7
When I click on element Input_2
When I click on element Input_5
When I click on element Input_8
Given Home Page_Yap is open
Then Yap_Card is displayed
When I click on element Bottone_Principale
Given I wait 2 seconds
Given Menu Page_Yap is open
When I click on element Bottone_Invia
Given InviaSoldi Page_Yap is open
Given I wait 2 seconds
Given I click on PopUp_InviaSoldiClose if present
Then InviaSoldiLabel is displayed
Given InviaSoldiLabel data matches Provayap.Labels
As a Provayap.Valid.Utenti
When I input data into CercaContatti
When I click on element Utente_TestCartaYap
Given InviaSoldi2 Page_Yap is open
Given InviaSoldiLabel data matches Provayap.Labels
When I click on element Input_2
When I click on element Input_0
When I click on element Input_0
When I click on element Input_0
When I click on element CTA_Avanti
Given ImportoSuperaLimitiSpesaLabel data matches Provayap.Labels
Given I wait 2 seconds
